text:
NEWS
from
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York, New York 10022
(212) 582-2020
(J. C. Dine)
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
WEDNESDAY, 19 FEBRUARY 1969
WALTER E. DUKA JOINS
CORPORATION FOR PUBLIC BROADCASTING
New York, 19 February â€” The appointment of Walter E. Duka
as Manager of National Program Information of the
Corporation for Public Broadcasting was announced today by
Frank Pace, Jr., Chairman of the Board.
Mr. Duka, who was formerly Public Affairs-Press
Relations Executive with Young & Rubicam, Inc., Advertising,
will report to William J. Colihan, Jr., Consultant to the
Corporation in Promotion and Research. He will also assist
Josef C. Dine, Director of Public Information, in special
public relations and corporate projects.
(MORE)
